data.message: When rebuilding a design from scratch using DURO OS, the most impactful fix is often FLOW PATH. In Lore V1, the CTA was on the LEFT while content flowed RIGHT — creating friction before conversion. V2 placed CTA at bottom-right (end of natural flow). This single change moved Flow Control score from 3/5 to 5/5. Always map: Enter → Travel → Convert BEFORE placing elements.
